name: catalog_albums
description: Fetch catalog album data from the Billboard API for a specified week.

week.description: The week for which to fetch the catalog albums chart in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. Defaults to '2022-10-08'.

name: artist_100
description: Fetches the Billboard Artist 100 chart data for a specified week.

week.description: The week for which to fetch the chart data in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. Defaults to the most recent week.

name: getallquotes
description: Fetch all quotes from the Radio World API with optional pagination and API key.

limit.description: The number of quotes to fetch per page. Defaults to 10.

page.description: The page number to fetch. Defaults to 1.

name: greatest_of_all_time_hot_100_songs
description: Retrieves the Greatest of All Time Hot 100 Songs chart from the Billboard API.

range.description: A string specifying the range of results to return, formatted as 'start-end'. Defaults to '1-10'.

name: top_artists
description: Fetch the YEAR-END Top Artists chart information from the Billboard API for a specified year.

year.description: The year for which to retrieve the Top Artists chart information in YYYY format. Defaults to '2022'.

name: bolivia_songs
description: Fetches the Bolivia Songs chart information for a given range and date.

range.description: The range of the chart to fetch.

date.description: The date for which the chart information is required, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

name: billboard_global_200_year_end
description: Fetch the YEAR-END Billboard Global 200 chart information for a given year.

year.description: The year for which to fetch the chart data, in the format 'YYYY'. Defaults to '2022'.

name: albums_get_related_artist
description: Fetches related artist information for a given album using the Shazam API.

is_id.description: The value of the 'albums->id', 'id', or 'albumadamid' field returned from various Shazam API endpoints.

l.description: The language code to return results in. Defaults to 'en-US'.

name: billboard_global_excl_us
description: Fetches the Billboard Global Excl. US chart for a specified date using the RapidAPI service.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve the Billboard Global Excl. US chart, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'. Available data starts from September 19, 2020.

name: list_album_tracks
description: Fetches a list of tracks for a given album from the Spotify API, with optional pagination support.

albumid.description: The unique identifier for the album.

limit.description: The maximum number of tracks to return per request. Defaults to None.

offset.description: The number of tracks to skip before starting to collect the result set. Defaults to None.

name: playlist_extraction
description: Retrieves information about songs in a playlist from YouTube, Spotify, or SoundCloud using the RapidAPI service.

search.description: The search query for the playlist.

name: retrieve_file
description: Retrieves a file from the server using the provided file path and API key.

path.description: The path of the file to be retrieved. This path is typically obtained by replacing the /p/ path in the /merge and /edit endpoint responses with /f/ or /d/.

name: view_song_copy
description: Retrieves detailed information about a song using the specified parameters.

https_only.description: Indicates if the request should use HTTPS only.

wmid.description: Identifier for the user or session making the request.

songid.description: Identifier for the song whose information is being retrieved.

s.description: Signature or token required for the API call.

country.description: Country code where the request is made from.

name: concerts
description: Fetches concert information using the Spotify API through RapidAPI, filtered by the specified geographical location.

gl.description: The geographical location filter to apply when fetching concert information.

name: get_artist
description: Fetches detailed information about an artist from the YouTube Music API, including their top releases such as songs, albums, singles, videos, and related artists.

channel_id.description: The YouTube channel ID of the artist. Defaults to 'UCedvOgsKFzcK3hA5taf3KoQ'.

name: hot_100_songs
description: Fetch the Billboard YEAR-END Hot 100 Songs chart information for a specified year.

year.description: The year for which to retrieve the chart, in YYYY format. Defaults to '2022'.

name: shazam_songs_list_similarities
description: Fetches similar songs using the Shazam API.

is_id.description: The ID of the song for which similar songs are to be fetched.

locale.description: The language code for the results. Defaults to 'en-US'.

name: get_song_related
description: Fetches related content for a song using the YouTube Music API.

browse_id.description: The unique identifier for the song being queried.

name: get_artist_s_albums
description: Fetches and returns basic details about the albums of an artist from a given Spotify URL.

spotify_url.description: The URL of the artist's Spotify page.

name: list_weekly_top_albums
description: Fetches the weekly top albums from Spotify for a given date and region.

date.description: The date in `YYYY-MM-DD` format for which to retrieve the top albums. Leave blank to get the latest chart.

region.description: The region code (ISO 3166 alpha-2, e.g., `US`) for which to retrieve the top albums. Defaults to `global`.

name: get_futured_playlists
description: Fetch featured playlists for a specific country and timestamp from Spotify.

timestamp.description: Date of the featured playlists in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd'.

country.description: Country code to fetch playlists for. Must be one of the following:

offset.description: Number of items to skip (default is 0).

limit.description: Maximum number of items to return (default is 20, max is 50).

name: india_songs
description: Fetch the India Songs chart information for a given date and range from the Billboard API.

date.description: The date for which the chart information is requested, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

range.description: The range of chart positions to retrieve.

name: related_artists
description: Fetches related artists for a given artist ID using the Spotify RapidAPI.

artist_id.description: The Spotify ID of the artist to find related artists for.

name: get_podcast_metadata
description: Fetch full details of a podcast using its Show ID from Spotify's metadata API.

showid.description: The unique identifier for the podcast show.

name: get_home_page_overview
description: Fetches trending information displayed on the Spotify home page as an incognito visitor.

region.description: Region code (ISO 3166 alpha-2) for localized results. Defaults to `None`, which will fallback to `US` if unsupported.

name: referents
description: Fetch referents, which are sections of content items (songs or web pages) where annotations are attached, using various filter options.

song_id.description: ID of a song to get referents for. Default is '2396871'.

page.description: Paginated offset, for example, per_page=5&page=3 returns items 11–15.

created_by_id.description: ID of a user to get referents for.

text_format.description: Format for text bodies related to the document. One or more of `dom`, `plain`, `markdown`, and `html`, separated by commas (defaults to html).

per_page.description: Number of results to return per request.

web_page_id.description: ID of a web page to get referents for.

name: top_artists_male
description: Fetches the YEAR-END Top Artists - Male chart information from the Billboard API.

year.description: The year for which to retrieve the chart information in 'YYYY' format. Defaults to '2022' if not provided.

name: billboard_global_200
description: Fetch Billboard Global 200 chart information for a specific date.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve the chart information, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

name: iceland_songs
description: Fetches the Iceland Songs chart information from the Billboard API for a specific date and range.

date.description: The date for which the chart information is requested, in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

range.description: The range of the chart information to fetch.

name: billboard_200
description: Retrieves the Billboard 200 chart for a specified date.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve the Billboard 200 chart, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

range.description: The range of chart positions to return (default is '1-10'). Use '1-200' to get all results.

name: independent_albums
description: Retrieves the Independent Albums chart for a specified week from the Billboard API.

week.description: The week for which to retrieve the chart, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. If not provided, defaults to the previous week. If the provided date is not a Saturday, it will default to the preceding Saturday of that week.

name: songs_v2_get_details
description: Gets detailed information about a specific song using the given song ID.

is_id.description: The ID of the song to retrieve details for.

l.description: The language code for the response (default is 'en-US').

name: new_releases
description: Retrieves new music releases from Spotify based on the given country code.

country.description: The country code to fetch new releases for. Example values include 'US', 'CA', 'SE', 'IN', 'UK'.

name: all_songs_from_artist
description: Retrieves all songs by the specified artist using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

artist.description: The name of the artist whose songs are to be retrieved.

name: youtube_topviews_artist_nationality
description: Fetches the top viewed music video by artists of the given nationality from YouTube.

name: artists_get_summary
description: Fetches summary information related to an artist from the Shazam API.

is_id.description: The value of 'artist->adamid' field returned in various Shazam API endpoints such as /search or /songs/get-details.

l.description: The language code for the response. Defaults to 'en-US'.

name: get_user_playlists
description: Retrieve a list of playlists for a given user from the YouTube Music API.

params.description: Pagination or filter parameters to customize the playlists retrieval.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user whose playlists are to be retrieved.

name: list_playlist_tracks_and_episodes
description: Lists tracks and episodes in a specified Spotify playlist.

playlistid.description: The ID of the playlist to list contents from.

offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect results. Defaults to `0`.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Defaults to `100`.

name: shazam_songs_get_details
description: Fetches song details from the Shazam API using a given song ID.

is_id.description: The value of the 'id' field returned by the /search endpoint on Shazam.

name: france_songs
description: Fetch the France Songs chart information for a given date and range.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve the chart, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.

range.description: The range of positions to retrieve from the chart (e.g., '1-10' for top 10 songs).

name: top_labels
description: Fetch the YEAR-END Top Labels chart information from the Billboard API.

year.description: The year for which to retrieve the top labels chart. Format should be YYYY. Defaults to '2022'.

name: girl_groups
description: Fetch information about K-pop girl groups based on various query parameters.

q.description: The search query to find specific girl groups.

by.description: The field by which to search for girl groups. Default is 'Group Name'. Possible values include:

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is to return all available results.

offset.description: The number of results to skip before starting to return results. Default is 0.

name: youtube_topviews_year
description: Retrieves the top-viewed YouTube videos for a specified year or for all time.

year.description: The year for which to retrieve the top-viewed YouTube videos. Use an empty string to retrieve all-time top views.

name: billboard_hot_100
description: Fetch the Billboard Hot 100 chart data for a given date and range.

date.description: The date for which to fetch the chart data in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

range.description: The range of chart positions to return, specified in the format 'start-end'. Default is '1-10'.

name: netherlands_songs
description: Fetch the Netherlands Songs chart information from the Billboard API.

range.description: The range of the chart to fetch.

date.description: The date of the chart in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

name: brazil_songs
description: Fetches the Brazil Songs chart information for a given date and range.

date.description: The date for which to fetch the chart data, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

range.description: The range of chart data to retrieve.

name: albums_get_details
description: Fetch detailed information of an album using the Shazam API.

is_id.description: The ID of the album. This value can be obtained from the 'id' field returned in /shazam-songs/get-details, /artists/get-albums, /artists/get-summary, /artists/get-latest-release, or from the 'albumadamid' field in /songs/v2/detect, /songs/detect endpoints.

l.description: The language code for the details. Defaults to 'en-US'.

name: hot_trending_songs_powered_by_twitter
description: Fetch the HOT TRENDING SONGS POWERED BY TWITTER chart information for a specific date and range using the Toolbench RapidAPI key.

date.description: The date for which to fetch the chart information, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

range.description: The range of the chart, with a maximum value between 1-20.

name: artist_details_single
description: Fetch details of a single Spotify artist using the artist's ID.

artist_id.description: The Spotify ID of the artist whose details are to be fetched.

name: slovakia_songs
description: Fetches Slovakia Songs chart information for a given date range.

range.description: The range of songs to retrieve from the chart.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve the chart information, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

name: get_artist_albums
description: Fetches and returns information about an artist's albums from the YouTube Music API.

channel_id.description: The unique identifier for the artist's channel.

params.description: Parameters required to fetch artist details, typically obtained from the `get_artist` function.

name: fetch_track_details
description: Fetches the details of a specific track using the provided track ID from the latest Spotify downloader API.

track_id.description: The unique identifier of the track to fetch details for.

name: charts_track
description: Fetch a list of popular songs from a specified chart using the Shazam API.

listid.description: The identifier for the chart list, as returned by the `/charts/list` endpoint. Defaults to `None`.

pagesize.description: The number of items to fetch per response, with a maximum of 20. Defaults to `20`.

startfrom.description: The starting index for paging through the results. Defaults to `0`.

locale.description: The language code for the results. Defaults to `'en-US'`.

name: top_artists_duo_group
description: Fetches the YEAR-END Top Artists - Duo/Group chart information for a given year.

year.description: The year for which to retrieve the chart information in the format 'YYYY'. Defaults to '2022' if not provided.

name: get_album_metadata
description: Fetches full metadata details of a specified album using the Spotify Scraper API.

albumid.description: The unique ID of the album for which metadata is to be retrieved.

name: gethomepage
description: Fetch limited radio station data to display on the homepage.

limit.description: The number of radio stations to retrieve. Default is 10.

name: list_top_tracks
description: Fetches the weekly or daily top tracks from Spotify for a specified region and date.

region.description: The region code in ISO 3166 alpha-2 format (e.g., 'US'). Defaults to 'global'.

type.description: The time span for the chart. Defaults to 'weekly'.

date.description: The date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. Leave blank to get the latest chart.

name: u_k_songs
description: Fetches the U.K. Songs chart information for a specific date and range from the Billboard API.

date.description: The date for which the chart information is requested, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

range.description: The range of the chart data to fetch.

name: artists_get_top_songs
description: Fetches the top songs of a specified artist using the Shazam API.

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the artist, which can be obtained from various Shazam API endpoints.

l.description: The language code for the response. Defaults to 'en-US'.

name: get_new_releases
description: Fetch new album releases from Spotify for a specified country.

country.description: A standardized country code (e.g., 'US' for United States, 'CA' for Canada). Full list of supported country codes includes: AD, AE, AG, AL, AM, AO, AR, AT, AU, AZ, BA, BB, BD, BE, BF, BG, BH, BI, BJ, BN, BO, BR, BS, BT, BW, BZ, CA, CD, CG, CH, CI, CL, CM, CO, CR, CV, CW, CY, CZ, DE, DJ, DK, DM, DO, DZ, EC, EE, EG, ES, ET, FI, FJ, FM, FR, GA, GB, GD, GE, GH, GM, GN, GQ, GR, GT, GW, GY, HK, HN, HR, HT, HU, ID, IE, IL, IN, IQ, IS, IT, JM, JO, JP, KE, KG, KH, KI, KM, KN, KR, KW, KZ, LA, LB, LC, LI, LK, LR, LS, LT, LU, LV, LY, MA, MC, MD, ME, MG, MH, MK, ML, MN, MO, MR, MT, MU, MV, MW, MX, MY, MZ, NA, NE, NG, NI, NL, NO, NP, NR, NZ, OM, PA, PE, PG, PH, PK, PL, PS, PT, PW, PY, QA, RO, RS, RW, SA, SB, SC, SE, SG, SI, SK, SL, SM, SN, SR, ST, SV, SZ, TD, TG, TH, TJ, TL, TN, TO, TR, TT, TV, TW, TZ, UA, UG, US, UY, UZ, VC, VE, VN, VU, WS, XK, ZA, ZM, ZW.

limit.description: Maximum number of album releases to return (default is 20; maximum allowed is 50).

offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set (default is 0).

name: list_top_artists
description: Fetches the top artists from Spotify based on the specified criteria.

type.description: Time span for the chart, either `weekly` or `daily`. Defaults to `weekly`.

date.description: Date for the chart in `YYYY-MM-DD` format. Leave blank to get the latest chart.

region.description: Region code in ISO 3166 alpha-2 format (e.g., `US`). Defaults to `global`.

name: get_episode_downloadable_audio
description: Fetches the full details of a given podcast episode. Provides a downloadable URL of the full audio if available.

episodeid.description: The unique identifier for the podcast episode.

name: artis_info
description: Fetches and returns album information for an artist based on the given parameters.

num.description: Number of albums to fetch information for.

lang.description: Language code for the response data.

index.description: Index position from which to start fetching the album data.

is_id.description: ID of the artist whose albums information is to be fetched.

name: downloader
description: This function searches for MP3 music using the given keywords and returns the results from the specified page.

keywords.description: The search keywords for finding MP3 music.

page.description: The page number of the search results to retrieve. Defaults to '1'.

name: greatest_of_all_time_songs_of_the_summer
description: Fetches the Greatest of All Time Songs of the Summer chart from the Billboard API.

range.description: The range of songs to retrieve. Default is '1-10'.

name: singapore_songs
description: Fetches the Singapore Songs chart information from the Billboard API.

range.description: The range of chart information to fetch.

date.description: The date of the chart in YYYY-MM-DD format.

name: artists_get_details
description: Retrieve detailed information about an artist using the Shazam API.

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the artist. This value can be obtained from various Shazam API endpoints, such as 'artist->adamid' from /search, /songs/v2/detect, or /songs/get-details, or 'artists->id' from /shazam-songs/get-details, /albums/get-details, or /albums/get-related-artist.

l.description: The language code for the response. Defaults to 'en-US'.

name: song_by_id
description: Fetches a song's details by its unique identifier from the Halsey Lyrics Snippets API.

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the song to be retrieved.

name: artists_get_latest_release
description: Gets the latest release of an artist using the Shazam API.

is_id.description: The ID of the artist. This is the value of the 'artist->adamid' field returned by various endpoints such as .../search, .../songs/v2/detect, or .../songs/get-details.

name: annotation_versions
description: Gets the versions of an annotation from the Genius Song Lyrics API.

text_format.description: Format for text bodies related to the annotation. Options include `dom`, `plain`, `markdown`, and `html`. Defaults to `html`.

name: tangga_lagu
description: Fetches the top tracks from the specified music chart.

index.description: The starting index of the track list.

num.description: The number of tracks to retrieve.

country.description: The country of the music chart.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the specific music chart.

name: web_page_lookup
description: Fetches metadata about a web page, including Genius's ID for the page, which can be used to look up associated referents.

raw_annotatable_url.description: The full URL of the web page (including protocol).

og_url.description: The URL specified by an og:url <meta> tag in the page's <head>.

canonical_url.description: The URL specified by a canonical <link> tag in the page's <head>.

text_format.description: Format for text bodies related to the document. One or more of `dom`, `plain`, `markdown`, and `html`, separated by commas (defaults to html).

name: south_africa_songs
description: Fetch the South Africa Songs chart information for a specific date range.

date.description: The date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' for which to retrieve the chart information.

range.description: The range of the chart positions to be retrieved.

name: hungary_songs
description: Fetches the Hungary Songs chart information from the Billboard API for the specified date and range.

range.description: The range of the songs chart to fetch.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve the songs chart, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

name: list_podcast_episodes
description: Gets a list of episodes for a given podcast show from the Spotify Scraper API.

showid.description: The unique identifier of the podcast show.

limit.description: The maximum number of items returned per request. Defaults to `100`.

offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set. Defaults to `0`.

name: user_contributions_transcriptions
description: Fetches user transcription contributions from the Genius Song Lyrics API.

is_id.description: The user ID whose contributions are to be fetched.

next_cursor.description: The pagination cursor for fetching the next set of results. Defaults to None.

text_format.description: The format for text bodies related to the document, can be one or more of `dom`, `plain`, `markdown`, and `html`, separated by commas. Defaults to 'html'.

per_page.description: The number of results to return per request. Defaults to 10.

sort.description: The sorting method for the results, can be 'popularity' or 'chronologically'. Defaults to None.

name: get_playlist_album_metadata
description: Fetches full metadata of a playlist or album from SoundCloud.

playlist.description: The URL or ID of the playlist or album to fetch metadata for.

name: get_playlist_metadata
description: Fetches full details of a Spotify playlist using RapidAPI.

playlistid.description: The ID of the Spotify playlist.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Defaults to None.

offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to return results. Defaults to None.

name: billboard_u_s_afrobeats_songs
description: Fetch the BILLBOARD U.S. AFROBEATS SONGS chart information for a given date and range.

date.description: The date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' for which the chart information is to be fetched.

range.description: The range of songs to be included in the chart, with a maximum range of 1-50.
